run_bash(cmd, return_output=True)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
out = run_bash('ls')

Setting up in colab

If you're in colab, you may not have the proper packages installed. Running this function will set you up to work in colab.

{% raw %}

colab_setup[source]

colab_setup()

Sets up for development in Google Colab. Repo must be cloned in drive/colab/ directory.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
colab_setup()

Working in /Users/michaelfrantz/Google Drive/colab/dessiccate
Running locally
{% endraw %}

Path

Often, you want to create a new directory. Even if all you have is a file path, you can now call mkdir_if_not_exists to create the parent directory.

{% raw %}

mkdir_if_not_exists[source]

mkdir_if_not_exists(parents=True)

Creates the directory of the path if ot doesn't exist. If the path is a file, will not make the file itself, but will create the parent directory.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path = Path('testdir/test.txt')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert not path.exists()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path.mkdir_if_not_exists()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert not path.exists()
assert path.parent.exists()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path.parent.rmdir()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert not path.parent.exists()
{% endraw %}
